faq.question: What is SnapTogether?
faq.answer: SnapTogether is a photo-sharing tool that allows guests to upload event photos by scanning a QR code, making it easy for hosts to collect memories.

faq.question: How do I upload photos as a guest?
faq.answer: Scan the QR code given to you by the host, enter your name, and upload your favorite photos from the event — no account needed.

faq.question: Do I need to create an account?
faq.answer: No. Guests don’t need an account. Hosts just create a one-time event link.

faq.question: Where are the photos stored?
faq.answer: All images are securely uploaded and stored on the cloud, ensuring they’re safe and accessible for the host.

faq.question: What's the difference between Free, Starter, and Pro plans?
faq.answer: Free: Limited storage, no videos. Starter: More storage & support. Pro: Max storage, videos, branding.

faq.question: How long are my photos available?
faq.answer: Uploaded media is available for 30 days after the event unless you're on a paid plan.

aboutPage.title: About SnapTogether
aboutPage.subtitle: SnapTogether is a simple way to collect photos and videos from your guests, making every event more memorable — all without an app.

sections.title: Capture Moments Easily
sections.description: SnapTogether is a simple way to collect all the special moments from your event — captured by your guests.

sections.title: Create Your Event Instantly
sections.description: Whether it’s a wedding, birthday, business opening, or any kind of celebration — you can create an event on our website and instantly get a unique QR code.

sections.title: Effortless Guest Sharing
sections.description: Share that QR code with your guests. When they scan it, they can easily upload the photos they take during your event — no apps, no sign-up, just quick and easy sharing.

sections.title: A Gallery of Memories
sections.description: As the host, you’ll receive all the photos in one place, giving you a beautiful collection of memories from every angle — straight from your guests’ phones.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.content: SnapTogether values your privacy. We collect only the necessary information to deliver our services — such as photos, videos, and names. We do not share your data with third parties. All uploads are automatically deleted based on your plan’s retention period.

termsPage.title: Terms of Use
termsPage.content: By using SnapTogether, you agree not to upload harmful or illegal content. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms. Your data will be retained according to the plan you choose. We may update these terms periodically.
